alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the dialkyl ether functional group, with the formula ROR', where R and R' are aryl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Diarylethers

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds contaning a phenoxy group.
alternative_parents.name: Phenoxy compounds

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing an ether group substituted with a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Phenol ethers

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one or more fluorine atoms attached to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Fluorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organosilicon compounds with the general formula R[Si]R' (R = alkyl, R' = aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Alkylarylsilanes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl aryl ether functional group with the generic formula R-O-R' , where R is an alkyl group and R' is an aryl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl aryl ethers

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl fluoride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl fluorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a metalloid atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metalloid salts

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a fluorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organofluorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as diphenylethers. These are aromatic compounds containing two benzene rings linked to each other through an ether group.

direct_parent.description: Aromatic compounds containing two benzene rings linked to each other through an ether group.
direct_parent.name: Diphenylethers

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing two benzene rings linked to each other through an ether group.
subclass.name: Diphenylethers

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
